title: Nocturne Q/Passive cooldown flash bug
body: So, we all know Nocturnes passive reduces in cooldown every time you auto, and his q does not. However, in-game as of patch 5.20, whenever you auto attack the passive will still be reduced in cooldown but it does not flash to indicate it, and instead his q flashes every time you auto as if the cooldown was being reduced, but it isn't reduced. Just a little clarity fix for everyone's favorite spookyman {{champion:56}}
